items.content_html: A lightweight Tailwind CSS plugin that adds utilities for managing content visibility (content-visibility) and intrinsic size hints (contain-intrinsic-size). Optimize rendering performance with flexible size hints using custom theme values.
items.title: peterbenoit/tailwindcss-visibility: A lightweight Tailwind CSS plugin that adds utilities for managing content visibility (content-visibility) and intrinsic size hints (contain-intrinsic-size). Optimize rendering performance with flexible size hints using custom theme values.

items.content_html: A simple, lightweight web UI component library, built with both UX and DX in mind.
items.title: MartinaeyNL/ui-components: A simple, lightweight web UI component library, built with both UX and DX in mind.

items.content_html: The Dropdown Table Plugin is a lightweight and customizable jQuery plugin designed to create interactive dropdowns with tabular data. It allows users to search, filter, and select items from a data table embedded in a dropdown.
items.title: nalindaDJ/dropdownTable: The Dropdown Table Plugin is a lightweight and customizable jQuery plugin designed to create interactive dropdowns with tabular data. It allows users to search, filter, and select items from a data table embedded in a dropdown.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: Qodalis-Solutions/qodalis-angular-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: DanilLib is a lightweight utility library designed to simplify working with person objects. It provides essential functions like `getAge`, `getName`, `getProfession`, and more to extract and manage data effectively.
